title: 1.9.4服务器载入存档后不能启动
author: 帅杀风云110
txt_content:
试过了很多存档，都是不能启动，错误原因大同小异
服务端用的是TorchSpigot1.9.4
有没有哪位高人知道解决方法
错误报告如下：
[07:07:20] [Server thread/INFO]: **** Beginning UUID conversion, this may take A LONG time ****
[07:07:20] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing level "world"
[07:07:20] [Server thread/WARN]: java.io.FileNotFoundException: ./world/session.lock (Permission denied)
[07:07:20] [Server thread/WARN]:         at java.io.FileOutputStream.open0(Native Method)
[07:07:20] [Server thread/WARN]:         at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(FileOutputStream.java:270)

[07:07:20] [Server thread/WARN]:         at net.minecraft.server.v1_9_R2.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:589)
[07:07:20] [Server thread/WARN]:         at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
[07:07:20] [Server thread/ERROR]: Encountered an unexpected exception
java.lang.RuntimeException: Failed to check session lock for world located at ./world, aborting. Stop the server and delete the session.lock in this world to prevent further issues.
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_9_R2.WorldNBTStorage.i(WorldNBTStorage.java:61) ~[java8.jar:git-TacoSpigot-unknown]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_9_R2.WorldNBTStorage.<init>(WorldNBTStorage.java:45) ~[java8.jar:git-TacoSpigot-unknown]

[07:07:20] [Server thread/ERROR]: This crash report has been saved to: /home/multicraft/multicraft/servers/server4/./crash-reports/crash-2017-06-30_07.07.20-server.txt

replies.author: 帅杀风云110
replies.txt_content:
浅念哥 发表于 2017-6-30 18:56
参考我以前的回答：
http://mcbbs.tvt.im/thread-695334-1-1.html
存档能加载后，区块加载错误，试了很多个存档都是这样
